document_data.name: Lorhanna
document_data.mainbody: '''Lorhanna''' was a priest of [[Tempus]] in [[Yûlash]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|12}}
document_data.Activities: Lorhanna took care of the shrine to Tempus in the [[Red Plumes]] encampment in Yûlash.
document_data.History:
Lorhanna was exiled from [[Hillsfar]] by [[Torin Nomerthal]] because he disagreed with the use of non-[[human]]s in the arena.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], during the visit of Torin Nomerthal to the city, Lorhanna possibly joined an adventuring party hired by [[Elanil Elassidil]] to try to remove the First Lord from power. She spoke to gain the support of the soldiers.{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|15}}
document_data.Personality: Lorhanna believed it was dishonorable to force untrained warriors to fight to the death for the amusement of others.
